title: Create a JSON Web Token
name: Authenticate
description: Create a JSON Web Token based on the sent user. This token is needed to access most of the API. The token should be set in the Authorization header

Success 200.description: JSON Web Token. To be used in the Authorization header

Parameter.description: Name of the sender. Default will be set to a generic term, such as "SYSTEM"

examples.title: Success-Response:
Success-Response:

title: Delete all calibration missions for a specific station
name: RemoveCalibrationMissionsByStationId
description: Delete all calibration missions for a specific station

Success 200.description: Date when the device was last updated
More recognizable identificator than device ID. Defaults to deviceId
Name of the last user logged in on device

title: Update device alias
name: UpdateDeviceAlias
description: Update device. It will update lastAlive with current time and lastUser from token, if set

Success 200.description: Date when the device was last updated (now)
Name of the last user logged in on device

title: Update device. Will be created if it doesn't exist
name: UpdateDevices
description: Update device. It will update lastAlive with current time and lastUser from token, if set. It is accessible by anonymous users

Success 200.description: Date when the device was last updated (now)
Name of the last user logged in on device

Parameter.description: ID of the docFile. Will be used to retrieve this specific docFile
Should the docFile be public? Non-public docFiles can only be retrieved with its docFile ID

Success 200.description: Found docFile with sent docFile ID. Empty if no match was found

title: Get specific docFile
name: GetDocFile
description: Retrieve a specific docFile based on the sent docFile ID

Success 200.description: Found docFile with sent docFile ID. Empty if no match was found
All public docFiles. Empty if no match was found

name: GetGameUsers

Parameter.description: Station ID that will be matched against users

title: Change start or end time of round
name: ChangeRoundTime
description: Change start or end time of round

title: Trigger end of a lantern round
name: EndLanternRound

title: Trigger start of a lantern round
name: StartLanternRound

Parameter.description: Is the station active? Defaults to false
Amount of digital currency sent to user
Team id of the owner. Will be ignored if resetOwner is set. owner === -1 act the same as setting resetOwner to true.
Should the owner be removed? Will also set isUnderAttack to false.
Is the station under attack? Will be ignored if resetOwner or owner === -1 is set.
Amount of digital currency sent to user.
Is the team active? Defaults to false
Should the teams total points be reset to 0? data.team.points will be ignored if set

name: AddBannedMail
description: Adds mail domains or mail addresses to blacklist. These will not be allowed to use during user registration

title: Request user password reset
name: RequestPasswordRecovery
description: Request user password reset. A mail will be sent to the user's registered mail address

Parameter.description: User name of the user that will receive a password recovery mail

title: Resend verification mail to all unverified users
name: ResendAllVerificationMail
description: Resend verification mail to all unverified users

title: Set position for user
name: SetUserPosition
description: Set a new position for the user

Parameter.description: Accuracy (in meters) for the position. Will be defaulted if not set
Velocity (meters per second) of the unit being tracked
Heading of the unit being tracked. Extressed in degrees. 0 indicates true north, 90 east, 270 west)

title: Create or update position
name: UpdatePosition
description: Update position. It will create a new position if it doesn't exist

Parameter.description: Accuracy (in meters) for the position. Will be defaulted if not set
Velocity (meters per second) of the unit being tracked
Heading of the unit being tracked. Extressed in degrees. 0 indicates true north, 90 east, 270 west)
Password for the room. Leave unset if you don't want to password-protect the room
Minimum access level required to see the room. 0 = ANONYMOUS. 1 = registered user. Default is 1.
Minimum access level required to follow the room. 0 = ANONYMOUS. 1 = registered user. Default is 1.

title: Get specific room
name: GetRoom
description: Retrieve a specific room, based on sent room name

Success 200.description: Found room. Empty if no room was found

title: Get rooms
name: GetRooms
description: Retrieve all rooms available to your user

title: Match followed rooms with sent partial room name
name: MatchFollowedRoomName
description: Retrieve a collection of followed rooms, based on the sent partial name. The match is done from index 0

Success 200.description: Found rooms. Empty array if no rooms were found

title: Match rooms with sent partial room name
name: MatchRoomName
description: Retrieve a collection of rooms, based on the sent partial name. The match is done from index 0

Success 200.description: Found rooms. Empty array if no rooms were found

title: Send a message to a room or user
name: SendMessage
description: Send a message to a room or user

Parameter.description: Room name to send message to. Can also be user name if the message is a whisper
Name of the sender. Default is your user name. You can instead set it to one of your user's aliases

title: Get specific team
name: GetTeam
description: Get a specific team by short or full name

Parameter.description: Short or full name of the team to retrieve

title: Cancel user's mission
name: CancelCalibrationMission
description: Cancel a calibration mission. Mission will still be set to completed, but no transaction will be created

title: Complete user's calibration mission

description: Complete the mission. A transaction will be created
